## gf_star

## Description
Returns a star graph with Long ID type, consisting of a central element indexed 0 (the root) and the n other leaf vertices 1, 2, ..., n.


## Usage
```r
gf_star(sc, n)
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| sc | A Spark connection. |
| n | The number of leaves. |








## Examples
```r


gf_star(sc, 5)


```
